subject: Self Care
title: Tech-Life Boundaries
description: A quick win: understand Tech-Life Boundaries.

hook.text: Technology is a great servant and a terrible master. The difference is whether you set the boundaries or it does.

buildup.text: Tech boundaries mean explicit rules about when, where, and how you engage with digital devices and platforms.

discovery.text: People with clear tech boundaries report 30% lower stress and 25% better sleep than those with no digital rules.

twist.text: Boundaries aren't about using less technology. They're about using it on your terms instead of its terms.

climax.text: Write three tech rules: when screens stop, where phones don't go, and which apps earn your time. Post them visibly.

punchline.text: Set the rules for tech, or tech sets the rules for you.

quiz.question: What impact do clear tech boundaries have on stress?
